articles.description: The 70-year-old victim divulged his bank credentials to a scammer after being told his computer had been hacked and his bank accounts were used for illegal activities.

articles.title: Cases down, losses up: Hong Kong fights phone scams as amount swindled quadruples to US$101 million
articles.description: Impersonation scams accounted for the vast majority of losses, with an increase in the number of mainland Chinese students getting ensnared. One person had HK$800,000 (US$102,000) moved out of her bank account.
